title: 473.762 LOCAL TAXES.
text: No new or additional local sales or use tax shall be imposed on sales at the ballpark site unless the tax is applicable throughout the taxing jurisdiction. No new or additional local tax shall be imposed on sales of tickets and admissions to baseball events at the ballpark, notwithstanding any law or ordinance, unless the tax is applicable throughout the taxing jurisdiction. The admissions and amusements tax currently imposed by the city of Minneapolis pursuant to Laws 1969, chapter 1092, may apply to admissions for baseball events at the ballpark.
